name: interface-connected-admins-info

interface.description: Interface that admins is connected through.

GET.summary:
Return admins info that are connected to current interface.
Access Group: netgrp.cfg

help: Return admins info that are connected to current interface.

current_admin_connected.name: current_admin_connected
current_admin_connected.title: Current Admin Connected
current_admin_connected.description: True when the current admin is connected through the provided interface.

num_admins_connected.name: num_admins_connected
num_admins_connected.title: Number of Administrators
num_admins_connected.description: Number of administrators that are connected through the provided interface.

admin_methods.name: admin_methods
admin_methods.title: Admin Methods
admin_methods.description: Connection methods which are used for admins to connect through the provided interface.

response_description: Information for admins connected through the provided interface.

interface.name: interface
interface.summary: Interface that admins is connected through.
